snippet: The Romney campaign declined to comment either on whether S.B.A. appropriations would be squeezed or, more generally, on the agency's place in Mr. Romney's small-business agenda.
abstract: The Romney campaign declined to comment either on whether S.B.A. appropriations would be squeezed or, more generally, on the agency's place in Mr. Romney's small-business agenda.

headline.main: Do Romney's Budget Pledges Threaten S.B.A. Loans?
